QuestData.Title: Unusual Behavior... Even For Gnolls
QuestData.Description: Allow me to concentrate for a moment.$b$b<You feel Daria's mind vision travel elsewhere, then it returns to you.>$b$bFurther down the trail, south of Taelan's Tower, the gnolls have carved out a small meeting area to the east of the main road. Something is happening there... I'm not certain what. We should investigate. I will look for anything out of the ordinary... you just protect yourself.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Gnolls can be such a headache.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Do you see that? That bottle, those supplies, on the ground!
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the gnoll hideout along the trail to Hearthglen in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Gnolls and necromancy... what a surprise! And I thought that, here in the Western Plaguelands, we had put these dark days behind us.$b$b<You sense Daria's eyes focusing on something on the ground.>$b$bWait... what is THAT?
